title: LFM for Dynamic/Competitive team
body:
Myself and my duo are looking for 3 to join us on our climb to the top of OCE.

We're currently sitting at G5 and G4. Both have experience in other competitive games and grinding to the top.

Currently looking for a Mid, ADC and Support player. Preferably be around our rank or higher. Also 18+ prefered. And be willing to learn and listen to each other. 

HMU in game for more info

replies.body: Hey I'm s5 looking for a team to climb with, as I main support in ranked and only really solo I find it hard to rank up as there is that many feeders and people who afk or don't care is stupid, I know I'm worthy of being apart of a team I just need that 1 chance. Let me know :) cheers
im s5 0lp, probs getting demoted, and dedicated but I am also 10, I would still bewilling to learn and listen though.
